 Welcome to Shadowplay:

You (as Ian Curtis) woke up on your sofa in the middle of the night. You don't remember anything since returning from the tour with your band.
And your wife Deborah is missing…

 How to play:

Move with WASD keys, look around with the mouse, and click on highlighted objects (these are the ones you can EXAMINE and interact with)…

But the console is essential for any interaction with the world. You can try to type here anything you want to do…

For more information and tips read the Shadowplay_Manual.pdf ↓ listen to Joy Division, and consider watching the Control (2007) film.
